title: Week 8 Progress
author: Amanpreet (Porting Flumotion)
content:
This week I mostly struggled with porting the custom elements. Though, I successfully ported FGDP producer + consumer components along with the Dirac encoder.

I also realised that I need to port components from TimVideoâ€™s flumotion-ugly repo as well for TimVideos streaming system to work.

Originally posted on Porting Flumotion - GSoC '14 Progress Blog
